segments.text: Sit down , please . Mr . Tang , do you bring any paper or certificate with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Here is a copy of the Tour Guide Certificate of mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you still working in Youth International Travel Agency ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I am on holidays this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many foreign languages can you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am bilingual , English and Russian .
segments.speaker: S2
